mapper.select: SELECT tenant_code, #{orderCreatedDay} AS order_created_day, COUNT(1) AS amount FROM order_act_record WHERE 1 = 1 AND tenant_code = #{tenantCode} AND DATE(order_gmt_created) = #{orderCreatedDay} AND TIME(order_gmt_created) >= '00:00:00' AND TIME(order_gmt_created) < '24:00:00' GROUP BY tenant_code, order_created_day
